price: 50. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: Rabbigayo waa kan siiyey wax walba qaabka uu leeyahay oo u tilmaamay (yoolkeed).”
arabic: قَالَ رَبُّنَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُۥ ثُمَّ هَدَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbunā alladhī aʿṭā kulla shayin khalqahu thumma hadā
